job.title: Remote Senior Site Reliability Engineer, SRE / DevOps Engineer
job.description:
This Jobot Job is hosted by Amber Heigerick
Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.
Salary $160,000 - $200,000 per year
We are a leading cloud-based financial technology company that is looking to add a Senior SRE / DevOps Engineer to our dynamic team! The team is crucial to building/deployment/monitoring automation of products for our cloud offering using cutting edge technologies.
We believe that everyone deserves to thrive at the company they are part of! We treat our employees like our clients, without you we wouldn't have a company! We have very low turn-over, because we have happy employees. We like to promote from with in whenever possible and 90% of the time, are able to do that.
The Senior DevOps Enginner is a key member of our fast-growing and high-performing team;
You should know the following
Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
